Dear Subscriber,

Okay, I admit it: I&#039;m running out of different ways to say it.
American police are, in many cases, FASCIST PIGS. Is that blunt
enough?

Watch the following video very carefully. Though there is no death,
gore, or any graphic violence, I find it extremely disgusting.


You see, it&#039;s now okay for the American Gestapo to forcibly stop
you, and demand to know who you are, even if they admit that they
have NO reason to think you&#039;ve done anything wrong. And if you
don&#039;t tell them, you get put in a cage. They will forcibly drag you
from your car, and then arrest YOU for "resisting arrest,"
"obstruction of justice," and "assaulting" a police officer.

But what is more telling, and more horrifying, than the act of
unjustified totalitarian violence is the ATTITUDE displayed by the
fascists in blue. Having "anti-government" materials, all by
itself, is now evidence of a crime?! Who educates and trains these
Nazi jackasses?

Some suggest that there are lots of good cops, too. Well, why have
I never heard THEIR outrage about this fascist crap? (I do,
however, have more than a few FORMER "law enforcement" folk on my e-
mail lists who are sickened by what passes for "law enforcement"
these days.) If you&#039;re in a gang that routinely intimidates,
harasses, terrorizes, extorts, assaults, and imprisons people who
have committed neither force nor fraud, don&#039;t tell me that you&#039;re
really a good guy. You aren&#039;t. If you want to prove that you give a
damn about justice, QUIT.

Sincerely,


Larken Rose, FOF, EOTS* <a href="
